summary: The ETF plans to invest in securities of companies that support the infrastructure and applications of the metaverse and would trade under the ticker “PUNK.”
title: Subversive Capital Files Application With SEC for a Metaverse ETF
content: Subversive Capital Acquisition, a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC), has filed an application with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for an exchange-traded fund (ETF) focused on the metaverse.
Read more: Invesco Files With SEC for Bitcoin Strategy ETF
